add-lines.content:
"cs-check": "php-cs-fixer fix --dry-run --diff -v --config=.php-cs-fixer_cw.php",
        "cs-fix": "php-cs-fixer fix --config=.php-cs-fixer_cw.php",
        "rector-check": "rector process --dry-run --config=rector_cw.php",
        "rector-fix": "rector process --config=rector_cw.php",
        "phpstan": "phpstan clear-result-cache --configuration=phpstan_cw.neon && phpstan analyse --configuration=phpstan_cw.neon ",
        "psalm": "psalm --clear-cache --config=psalm_cw.xml && psalm --config=psalm_cw.xml",
        "phpcs": "phpcs --no-cache --standard=phpcs_cw.xml",
        "phpcbf": "phpcbf  --standard=phpcs_cw.xml",
        "phpmd": "phpmd src text phpmd_cw.xml",
        "check-all": [
            "@cs-check",
            "@rector-check",
            "@phpstan",
            "@psalm",
            "@phpcs",
            "@phpmd"
        ],
        "fix-all": [
            "@cs-fix",
            "@rector-fix",
            "@phpcbf"
        ],
